name: 1TON Xmas
description:
● NEWS : Dot Square - New Puzzle Game Released !!!

1TON Xmas is simple, easy and addictive number game.

1! 2!! 3!!! Tap the number from 1 to N.
You can play beautiful christmas carols.

Merry Christmas~!

● FEATURES
- Beautiful Christmas Carols
- Combo System
- Ton, Continue, Time, and Hint items
- Retina Display Supported
- GameCenter Leaderboards
- GameCenter Achievements

● REQUIREMENTS
- iOS 4.3 or later (iOS 10 Compatible)

● SUPPORT E-MAIL : support@sharpapp.com
